idea-plugin.name: HulkTheme
idea-plugin.description:
About
HulkTheme is a bold, vibrant dark mode theme for developers who prefer an intense, powerful coding experience. Featuring dark purple backgrounds with Hulk green accents, this theme brings an energetic vibe to your IDE.
Experience your code in a whole new light with Hulk-inspired colors that will keep you coding for hours.
idea-plugin.change-notes: Initial release of the HulkTheme plugin. Includes vibrant Hulk greens, dark purple backgrounds, and enhanced syntax highlighting for Java, designed to bring a powerful atmosphere to your development environment.
